caption:
This photograph captures a tranquil and poignant scene at a beach. There are three children near the water's edge. On the left side of the image, one child wearing a dark jacket and jeans is kneeling down, appearing to be digging or playing in the sand. Centered in the picture, another child in a dark checkered jacket and pants is standing and seems to be looking out at the ocean waves. To the right, there's a child with blonde hair wearing a horizontally striped red and white sweater and blue jeans, also kneeling. 

The beach itself is sandy with a scattering of darker wet patches, indicating recent waves or high tide. The ocean is visible with gentle foamy waves approaching the shore, contributing to a serene atmosphere. The sky above the sea is overcast, suggesting a cool or cloudy day.

Overall, the composition, with its soft, muted colors and casual beach attire of the subjects, evokes a sense of calmness and the simple pleasures of childhood exploration and companionship.
title: Beach at middletown
